texts.text: v0.11.0 alpha build 12 is the twelfth build version released for 0.11.0.

Removed extra items (like different types of swords) from the creative inventory
Changed the way the select skin is highlighted

Fixed crash when the client uses the last item of a stack
Fixed crash when breaking flowers/mushrooms
Fixed crash when being disconnected while the game is suspended
Fixed buckets being unable to be used underwater
It’s now easier to get into boats while holding a boat in your hand (underwater)
Creative players can no longer be set on fire
Tiny slimes no longer spawn in Peaceful
Skins are now centered on the skin pack screen
Fixed several localization issues

MCPE-8039 - The player get damages when connecting to survival servers
MCPE-8099 - Chickens walk on water

MCPE-8164 - Fishing button while on a boat
MCPE-8224 - Clients are not losing inventory while they die
MCPE-8225 - Client's food doesn't consume upon use
MCPE-8291 - World List shows all worlds as having been played "Today" (even very old worlds)
MCPE-8328 - Grass not spreading
MCPE-8345 - Mob effects not dealing true damage
MCPE-8428 - Cave Spider Spawner does not generate in Mineshaft
MCPE-8435 - Boat type changing upon exiting the world
MCPE-8458 - Build 10 interaction range increase also affects survival mode when split controls off
MCPE-8482 - Arrow flies in wrong directon when in a boat

MCPE-8496 - Fire on player does not go off
MCPE-8506 - Axes incorrect order in inventory
